name: Ninja Gaiden 4 / Team Ninja Unkende 4
description:
The game is a continuation of the story about the adventures of the brave ninja Ryu (Unkende) Hayabusa. Technically, NG4 / TNU4 is a new game with already familiar and new level design, with ordinary enemies and bosses from the entire trilogy, whose behavior has been significantly changed.

Default Controls:
RIGHT / LEFT / UP / DOWN - Arrows
Button B (use sword) - Z
Button A (jump) - X
Button B + UP (use weapons) - Z + Up arrow
START - ENTER
SELECT - Right Shift

The project is absolutely free.
It needs the help of artists painting in pixel art style to draw sprites for levels and cutscenes.

YOUTUBE: https://www.youtube.com/user/2ndChannelsProjects
Public Page on VK: https://vk.com/tnu4page

The project has existed for almost 10 years.
The game is developed with Game Maker 7.
